# pendingRecordZoneChanges

**Instance Property**

The record zone changes that the sync engine has yet to send to the iCloud servers.

## Declaration

```swift
final var pendingRecordZoneChanges: [CKSyncEngine.PendingRecordZoneChange] { get }
```

## Discussion

This array contains any pending record zone changes to send to the iCloud servers in a subsequent send operation (scheduled or manual). After the sync engine sends those changes, your app’s sync delegate receives an event of type [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-5sie5/Event/SentRecordZoneChanges].

Use the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-5sie5/State-swift.class/add(pendingRecordZoneChanges:)] and [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKSyncEngine-5sie5/State-swift.class/remove(pendingRecordZoneChanges:)] methods to modify the array’s contents.

## Accessing pending changes

- **hasPendingUntrackedChanges**: A Boolean value that indicates whether there are pending changes that the sync engine is unaware of.
- **pendingDatabaseChanges**: The database changes that the sync engine has yet to send to the iCloud servers.
